Some light wear on the 2-3 first fret. - 2 very small scratches on the top - Some light edge wear - One small ding on top of the head stock - Very small surface scratches on the back - Light buckle rash More pictures available upon request Specifications: - Grover Tuners - P90 pickups - Carved Maple Top - Mahogany body - 50' neck profile Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment. Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
